description: This boy was a pleasant surprise at first, he was nicely dressed and well-mannered. Maybe a bit talkative but I didn´t mind. He needed 22 000 to pay a debt to a friend. I never borrow money to my friends because it´s the best way to destroy any relationship. Especially when the friend is a bit dangerous and hangs out with bad people. The boy was a bit naive about how emergency loans work. He wasn´t ready to pay high interest nor installments. So I offered him my deal for special customers. And he totally flipped out! It was such a drama! I couldn´t make him stop talking. Finally, I shut his hole with my cock. And you know what? I think the little devil liked being fucked in the ass. He even stroked me until I climaxed. With a smile on his face.
title: Debt Dandy 152
